name: TempStick
0:
”Alexa open temp stick and list my sensors”
”Get sensor name's last reading”
”Get my last alert”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: temp stick
Developer Terms of Use
des: Temp Stick is a Wi-Fi, battery powered, temperature and humidity monitoring sensor. With the Temp Stick, you can monitor the temperature and humidity levels in any room of your home or business. You can use the Temp Stick to get alerts when the temperature or humidity reach critical levels. With Alexa you can use voice commands to get the current temperature and humidity readings from your Temp Stick as well as check the status of your alerts. To use this skill, you will need to purchase a Temp Stick sensor from tempstick.com or Amazon, set it up with the Temp Stick app, and link your Temp Stick account with your Alexa account.
